thread.title: simply and profoundly shameful
thread.title_full: simply and profoundly shameful - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 449marcella
title: simply and profoundly shameful
text: I am writing this at 2:50 in the morning as I lie awake in a bed in this place since more than 2 hour ago. Do not bother wasting your money coming here: you will have more silence (and, by the way, less smell) if you throw yourself on the floor in front of a sausage stall at Victoria Station. And to be clear: I am not talking about the occasional drunken who may have made us unlucky, but of major operations of dismounting the restaurant (or similar room) downstairs. Night manager offers to move us NOW to another room. Thanks so much. Maybe a better solution is to move day manager to a position better suited to whatever competence is detected under careful scrutiny.
